title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Publications
body: Publications          TRAIL BROCHURE Side 1 - Overview (1.5 MB, PDF) This is a large file, please be patient while it loads. You can view it by clicking on the link, or you can save it to your computer by right-clicking and choosing the "Save Target As" option. Side 2 - Maps Download the text only trail brochure in large print. The brochure is formatted for ADA standards when printed at 11" x 17". For a printed copy e-mail us.  Â       RACK CARD Download the Santa Fe National Historic Trail rack card (598 KB PDF) for a general overview to start your journey on the trail.
